trans-unit.source: Represents information about an audio format.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.AudioFormat.SpeechAudioFormatInfo" /> class.
The value for the samples per second.
The value for the bits per sample.
A member of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.AudioFormat.AudioChannel" /> enumeration (indicating <c>Mono</c> or <c>Stereo</c>).
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.AudioFormat.SpeechAudioFormatInfo" /> class and specifies the samples per second, bits per sample, and the number of channels.
The following example shows a typical use of <xref:System.Speech.AudioFormat.SpeechAudioFormatInfo.%23ctor%2A> to specify the format of audio to output to a WAV file.
trans-unit.target: Das folgende Beispiel zeigt ein typisches Einsatzgebiet von <xref:System.Speech.AudioFormat.SpeechAudioFormatInfo.%23ctor%2A> das Format der Audio für die Ausgabe in eine WAV-Datei angeben.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.AudioFormat.SpeechAudioFormatInfo.%23ctor%2A> instance is an argument to the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Die <xref:System.Speech.AudioFormat.SpeechAudioFormatInfo.%23ctor%2A> Instanz ist ein Argument an die <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SetOutputToWaveFile%2A> Methode.

trans-unit.source: The encoding format.
The value for the samples per second.
The value for the bits per sample.
The value for the channel count.
The value for the average bytes per second.
The value for the BlockAlign.
A byte array containing the format-specific data.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.AudioFormat.SpeechAudioFormatInfo" /> class and specifies the encoding format, samples per second, bits per sample, number of channels, average bytes per second, block alignment value, and an array containing format-specific data.
Gets the average bytes per second of the audio.
The value for the average bytes per second.
trans-unit.target: Der Wert für die durchschnittliche Anzahl von Bytes pro Sekunde.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bits per sample of the audio.
The value for the bits per sample.
trans-unit.target: Der Wert für die Bits pro Sample.

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the block alignment in bytes.
The value for the block alignment.
trans-unit.target: Der Wert für die Ausrichtung des Blocks.

trans-unit.source: Software for playback and recording of audio handles audio data in blocks.
trans-unit.target: Software für Wiedergabe und Aufzeichnen von Audio verarbeitet Audiodaten in Blöcken.

trans-unit.source: The sizes of these blocks are multiples of the value of the <xref:System.Speech.AudioFormat.SpeechAudioFormatInfo.BlockAlign%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Die Größen dieser Blöcke sind Vielfache des Werts der <xref:System.Speech.AudioFormat.SpeechAudioFormatInfo.BlockAlign%2A> Eigenschaft.

trans-unit.source: Block alignment value is the number of bytes in an atomic unit (that is, a block) of audio for a particular format.
trans-unit.target: Block Ausrichtungswert ist die Anzahl der Bytes in eine unteilbare Einheit (d. h. einen Block) Audio für ein bestimmtes Format.

trans-unit.source: For Pulse Code Modulation (PCM) formats, the formula for calculating block alignment is as follows:
trans-unit.target: Für Pulse Code Modulation (PCM)-Formate lautet die Formel zur Berechnung Block Ausrichtung:

trans-unit.source: Block Alignment = Bytes per Sample x Number of Channels
trans-unit.target: Blockieren Sie Ausrichtung = Bytes pro Beispiel X Anzahl von Kanälen

trans-unit.source: For example, the block alignment value for 16-bit PCM format mono audio is 2 (2 bytes per sample x 1 channel).
trans-unit.target: Beispielsweise ist der Ausrichtungswert Block für 16-Bit-PCM Format Mono / Audio 2 (2 Bytes pro beispielkanal X 1).

trans-unit.source: For 16-bit PCM format stereo audio, the block alignment value is 4.
trans-unit.target: Für 16-Bit-PCM Format Stereo Audio ist der Ausrichtungswert Block 4.

trans-unit.source: Data written and read from a device must always start at the beginning of a block.
trans-unit.target: Die Daten geschrieben und von einem Gerät gelesen müssen immer am Anfang eines Blocks starten.

trans-unit.source: For example, it is illegal to start playback of PCM data in the middle of a sample (meaning on a boundary that is not block-aligned).
trans-unit.target: Es ist z. B. unzulässige zum Starten der Wiedergabe des PCM-Daten in der Mitte einer Stichprobe (d. h. auf einer Grenze, die nicht Block ausgerichtet ist.).

trans-unit.source: Gets the channel count of the audio.
The value for the channel count.
trans-unit.target: Der Wert für die Anzahl der Kanal.

trans-unit.source: Gets the encoding format of the audio.
The encoding format of the audio.
The object to be compared.

Returns whether a given object is an instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.AudioFormat.SpeechAudioFormatInfo" /> and equal to the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.AudioFormat.SpeechAudioFormatInfo" />.

Returns <see langword="true" /> if the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.AudioFormat.SpeechAudioFormatInfo" /> and that obtained from the <paramref name="obj" /> argument are equal, otherwise returns <see langword="false" />.
The method returns `false` if the <xref:System.Object> provided by the `obj` argument cannot be cast to <xref:System.Speech.AudioFormat.SpeechAudioFormatInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Gibt die Methode `false` Wenn die <xref:System.Object> gebotenen der `obj` Argument keine Typumwandlung in <xref:System.Speech.AudioFormat.SpeechAudioFormatInfo>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the format-specific data of the audio format.
A byte array containing the format-specific data.
Returns the hash code of the audio format.
The value for the hash code.
Gets the samples per second of the audio format.
The value for the samples per second.
trans-unit.target: Der Wert für die Beispiele sind pro Sekunde.
